elements.name: Verify whether user is able to create List and switch the created List to default List

connection from user to apigee endpoint happens
I search for the address "Darcy Road"
I select the "1" address as fulfilment address from matching addresses
I clear ALL the list for the user
I create a list with list name as "AutoList12"

I switch the default list to "AutoList12"
I verify list "AutoList12" is set as default list

elements.name: Create List and add free text item and Verify whether user is able to delete the item and list

steps.name: user continue to connect to apigee with login username as "SHOPPER_USERNAME7"
connection from user to apigee endpoint happens
I search for the address "Darcy Road"
I select the "1" address as fulfilment address from matching addresses
I clear ALL the list for the user
I create a list with exact list name as "AutoList Exact"
I add free text item "Coke" to list
user verifies the free text item "Coke" is added to list
user deletes free text item "Coke" from the new list
I delete the newly created list

elements.name: Create List and check / uncheck free text item to the list

steps.name: user continue to connect to apigee with login containing apigee99
connection from user to apigee endpoint happens
I search for the address "Darcy Road"
I select the "1" address as fulfilment address from matching addresses
I clear ALL the list for the user
I create a list with exact list name as "AutoList Exact"
I add free text item "Coke" to list and check the item to list
user verifies the free text item "Coke" is added to list and is checked
user un-checks the free text item "Coke" from the newly created list
user verifies the free text item "Coke" is added to "AutoList Exact" is unchecked
checks free text item "Coke" from the "AutoList Exact"
user verifies the free text item "Coke" is added to "AutoList Exact" is checked
